Package models

Class Stats

java.lang.Object
models.Stats
public class Stats extends Object
The Stats class maintains a record of numerous statiscal data that is pertinent to the Memory Game, such as number of games played, high scores, etc...

  • Constructor Details

    • Stats

  • Method Details

    • addScore

      public void addScore(String theme, String difficulty, int numGuesses)
      The addScore() method updates the Stats object with the score of the most recently played game. It increments the number of games played, calculates the average score for the given difficulty, and updates the high score, if necessary.
      Parameters:
      theme - Used to determine which theme was played.
      difficulty - Used to determine which difficulty was played.
      numGuesses - Used for the calculation of averages and high scores.

    • getEasyCatHighScore

      public int getEasyCatHighScore()
      A getter method. Returns the high score for the difficulty and theme that are in the title of the method.
      Returns:
      easyCatHighScore, the current high score for the difficulty and theme.

    • getEasyCatAvg

      public double getEasyCatAvg()
      A getter method. Returns the average score for the difficulty and theme that are in the title of the method.
      Returns:
      easyCatAverage, the current average score for the difficulty and theme.
